definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be [severed, fig.] alienated, estranged (cf. Ar. naqa9a split, rend, sacrifice RS:Sem. i. 471 f.; 2d ed. 491; Eth naq9a: split up, open (intrans.) Di:647; NH [[נֶקַע]] cleft, Syr. neq9o0 id.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נׇֽקְעָה נַפְשִׁי מֵעַל]] Ez Eze 23:18 my soul was estranged from her sister (‖[[יׇקַע]]), cf. v:Eze 23:22; v:Eze 23:28 (both c. [[מִן]]).
